main event: A civilian observed a single illuminated, elliptical-shaped object moving at high speed in Richmond, Missouri on June 23, 1964.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about the size of a basketball held at arm's length, very bright and glowing.
The object was silent and had no obvious means of propulsion.
It was moving at a steady rate of speed, estimated to be between 500-800 mph.
The object's course was straight and level, at an altitude of approximately 1000-1500 feet.
The object was visible for about 25-30 seconds before suddenly accelerating at tremendous speed and disappearing.
